name: Workout Plans Custom To Your Lifestyle
description:
Whether you can only spare ten minutes a day 3 times a week, or an hour every day of the week, anything is better than nothing right? Fitness UK's customized fitness plans are tailored around your lifestyle; when do you want to work out? how often? for how long? Not only that but where do you want to work out and what equipment if any have you got available? There is no excuse for neglecting exercise. 

You tell us what you want, or choose from our popular categories:
Weight Loss / Fat Loss
Bums and Tums
Abs
Bulking (Muscle Size)

Simply get in touch via the Fitness UK official Facebook page and request your workout plan today: 

http://www.facebook.com/fitnessukofficial

Orders will take up to 2 weeks to be written, published and posted.

(all fitness plans are based on a 4 week timetable, for 8 and 12 week plans get in touch and we will offer you a great discount!)
